author: Aaron Mathew
comment: Horrible app. Horrible service from Jet Airways as well. Take my money but don't confirm the ticket. Then tell me the transaction was unsuccessful, and that I need to pay more to book the same flight for which I've already paid money. Would not recommend this app to anyone.

author: devarsh pandya
comment: Worst app. Was trying to book ticket for international travel so cud get additional jp miles...but not showing the fare choice menu. Guess have to delete it nd start using other portals

author: Zoheb Somjee
comment: The app wont work. Wanted to book tickets using my privilege miles..  useless app.

reply.author: Jet Airways (India) Ltd.
reply.content: Hi Zoheb, we'd like to discuss this further. Kindly email us the error (screenshot preferred) & your contact no. at info@jetairways.com & we'll connect with you.

author: Yogesh Pathak
comment: Impossible to redeem your Jet Miles using this app... I have spent my entire after noon navigating from one error to the other.

reply.author: Jet Airways (India) Ltd.
reply.content: Hi Yogesh, we would like to speak to you. Please message us your mobile no. at info@jetairways.com

author: Santosh Kumar Jha
comment: Very badly built app which takes ages to respond on every screen and even redirections are not properly handled...this is the state of this app running on even high end phones and with 4G network. It seems that providing a bad customer experience is forte of Jet airways in every department!

reply.author: Jet Airways (India) Ltd.
reply.content: Your comment concerns us, Santosh. We'd like to speak to you. Please message us your mobile no. at info@jetairways.com

author: dileepan senguttuvan
comment: Worst app to register... No options for city lists but yet Asking to select the city and no options to type the city name... so failed attempt to register

reply.author: Jet Airways (India) Ltd.
reply.content: Hi Dileepan, we'd like to speak to you. Please message us your mobile no. at info@jetairways.com

author: T N Singh
comment: Payment options are only limited to debit and credit cards if you want to purchase seats. I booked flight tickets but later on while buying seats payment options are very much restricted and limited.

reply.author: Jet Airways (India) Ltd.
reply.content: Thanks. If you have any feedback pls write to us at info@jetairways.com.

author: Nicola Pascelupo
comment: Useless app, the Web check in always fails, the auto complete drop down list doesn't let you select certain airports (e.g. Ho Chi Minh City), completely irresponsive and slow, a real disappointment unfortunately. Said that, the website has exactly the same issues, when the code base behind is poor you can't expect more.

author: Krishna Murari
comment: Kindly avoid this app,  Its highly inaccurate, it shows double the rate for the same flight.   Better buy from your local travel agent

author: Mathew Owens
comment: Loses all info every time the app is sent to background. Useless.

reply.author: Jet Airways (India) Ltd.
reply.content: Hi Mathew, we'd definitely like to discuss on your feedback. Pls be assured we've shared it with our Mobile Services team for future consideration.

author: raMBAbu s
comment: Worst app.not responding every time. Why the in completed app published ??

reply.author: Jet Airways (India) Ltd.
reply.content: We'd like to discuss this further. Kindly email us your contact no. at info@jetairways.com & we'll connect with you.

author: Jasper Shekin J
comment: App crashes frequently. Website is better than app

reply.author: Jet Airways (India) Ltd.
reply.content: Hi Jasper, pls let us know if this is sorted; you may write to us at info@jetairways.com

comment: One of the best Airline app. We regularly travel in Jet airways and it is very useful and comfortable in all aspects

reply.author: Jet Airways (India) Ltd.
reply.content: We're glad. :) When are you flying with us next?

author: Pratik Sharma
comment: Worst app, extremely slow, no preview of booking before payment.

author: Satyajeet Singh
comment: Worst managed flight. Not at time flights.Reschedule flights and late always.

reply.author: Jet Airways (India) Ltd.
reply.content: We're concerned to note your comment, Satyajeet. Kindly share the experience at guestrelations@jetairways.com. If you have any feedback with respect to our app kindly email us at info@jetairways.com

comment: Terrible app can't even make a privilege account

author: Devendra Zope
comment: Worst app too much slow

reply.author: Jet Airways (India) Ltd.
reply.content: Hi Devendra, we always appreciate detailed feedback that helps us improve our app. Pls write to us at info@jetairways.com & we'll connect with you.

author: Taterao Bhosale
comment: Once I tried to use JetScreen in flight. After that I only see JetScreen notification whenever I open the app. Even after reinstalling the app. I can't login into the app.

author: Mohan Kumar
comment: This app sucks. It is not starting. It closes immediately when the app opened.

reply.author: Jet Airways (India) Ltd.
reply.content: Hi Mohan, pls let us know if this is sorted; you may write to us at info@jetairways.com.

author: fayaz shaikh
comment: Little bit slow app

reply.author: Jet Airways (India) Ltd.
reply.content: We'd like to discuss this further, Fayaz. Kindly email us at info@jetairways.com & we'll connect with you.

author: Irshad at Ichu
comment: I need to change my name in my jet privilage name. Is it possible.? Please help me.

author: Mohan Kabra
comment: Pl be friendly for web check in also.

author: Amit Jain
comment: Very slow..

reply.author: Jet Airways (India) Ltd.
reply.content: Your comment concerns us, Amit. We'd like to speak to you. Please message us your mobile no. at info@jetairways.com

author: Sudipta Sengupta
comment: I am finding it convenient.

reply.author: Jet Airways (India) Ltd.
reply.content: We're glad, Sudipta. :)

author: Noman Ansari
comment: Very bad experience

author: Kanchan Bhatt
comment: App is slow.

author: BASSKARAN SANKARARAMAN
comment: God's plan

author: Saravanan Jayakumar
comment: Waste App

reply.author: Jet Airways (India) Ltd.
reply.content: Your comment concerns us. Would be helpful if you could elaborate. Pls write to us at info@jetairways.com.

author: Tushar Dhote
comment: Excellent app, very useful

reply.author: Jet Airways (India) Ltd.
reply.content: We're glad, Tushar. :)

author: Kalpak Sane
comment: Horrible app

author: N C Shivaprakash
comment: It is a great feeling  Shivaprakash

author: Vinod Bhaskar
comment: It is very good app

author: Jagannath Burli
comment: Excellent App

reply.content: Glad. :)

author: Santanu Paul
comment: Good service

author: siva kumar
comment: Nice
Good

author: Jay Maurya
comment: This update is very poor, ask password every time and account gets locked just on couple of wrong credentials, it is difficult to remember the password, why can't you enable some pin kind of feature. And application performance have also been reduced. Please try to fix these issues.

reply.author: Jet Airways (India) Ltd.
reply.content: Hi Jay, pls understand user credentials are set as per the privacy & security requirements. Appreciate your understanding in this regard.

author: Vinod Daswani
comment: My advice to serious users is DON'T CONSUME YOUR MEMORY ON THIS APP. Prices are always HIGH, The same flight would cost cheaper from a 3rd party then from there own site. Sorry that sounds STUPID. All of you who are reading this PLEASE TRY WHAT I AM SAYING AND SOMETIMES THE DIFFERENCE IS  MASSIVE.

reply.author: Jet Airways (India) Ltd.
reply.content: Hi Vinod, your comment concerns us. If you have any feedback with respect to our app kindly email us at info@jetairways.com.

author: prashant kholia
comment: Very heavy application and take too much time to respond... I am using 4g net and other travel apps are far more faster than this plz do the needful

reply.author: Jet Airways (India) Ltd.
reply.content: Hi Prashant, thanks for your feedback. We've shared it with our Website team for future consideration.

author: Yogesh Solanki
comment: App is too slow to load. I am too disappointed. I am regular and frequent user of app. But i am too frustrated now. Please take necessary corrections.

reply.author: Jet Airways (India) Ltd.
reply.content: Hi Yogesh, we'd like to discuss this further. Kindly email us your contact no. at info@jetairways.com & we'll connect with you.
